#help

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```


Flory-Schulz

$w(r) = $\tau$^2r exp(-$\tau$r)$

```{r}
Mn <- 52100
repeat_unit <- 28.05

tau <- repeat_unit / Mn
```

$\tau$

```{r}
r <- seq(0, 10000, 100)

wr <- tau^2 * r * exp(-tau * r)
```

```{r}
flory <- as_tibble(list(r = r, wr = wr))
```


```{r}
flory |>
  ggplot(aes(x = r, y = wr)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_light()
```
